title: Terrace RCMP respond to firearms call on South Side
content_html:
Terrace RCMP responded to a firearms-related call on Goulet Ave. just before midnight Saturday May 30.

“Due to the nature of the complaint, police surrounded the address with their firearms ready,” a Terrace RCMP press release said.

One person was arrested “without incident,” according to the press release, and police seized firearms.

“Details of the call will not be released due to privacy,” the press release said.


jake.wray@terracestandard.com
